metadata.Title: CVE-2022-42719 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: A use-after-free in the mac80211 stack when parsing a multi-BSSID elementin the Linux kernel 5.2 through 5.19.x before 5.19.16 could be used byattackers (able to inject WLAN frames) to crash the kernel and potentiallyexecute code.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
